what: Axe, IBM, WAVE, and 13 custom tests

BCE (Bell Canada)
report motion
conduct and report an Axe test

items.description: Ensures ARIA attributes are allowed for an element's role

must pass all of.description: ARIA attribute cannot be used: aria-label

items.description: Ensures every ARIA dialog and alertdialog node has an accessible name

must pass any of.description: aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty

items.description: Ensures elements with an ARIA role that require child roles contain them

must pass any of.description: Required ARIA child role not present: tab

items.description: Ensures every id attribute value used in ARIA and in labels is unique

must pass any of.description: Document has multiple elements referenced with ARIA with the same id attribute: lrn_moreid

items.description: Ensures every id attribute value is unique

must pass any of.description: Document has multiple static elements with the same id attribute: Secondary_Offers_Brs_OntarioFibeDuoLTOFTTN
Element does not have text that is visible to screen readers
aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty

items.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct
Landmarks should have a unique role or role/label/title (i.e. accessible name) combination

must pass any of.description: The landmark must have a unique aria-label, aria-labelledby, or title to make landmarks distinguishable

items.description: Ensures <meta name="viewport"> can scale a significant amount

must pass any of.description: <meta> tag limits zooming on mobile devices

items.description: Nested interactive controls are not announced by screen readers
Ensure that the page, or at least one of its frames contains a level-one heading
Ensures all page content is contained by landmarks

must pass any of.description: Some page content is not contained by landmarks
Some page content is not contained by landmarks
Some page content is not contained by landmarks
Some page content is not contained by landmarks

acts.what: 3 packages and 13 custom tests, with duplication discounts

rules.axe: multiply minor by 2, moderate by 3, serious by 4, critical by 5; sum; subtract discounts
rules.bulk: subtract 150 from visible elements; make 0 if negative; raise to 0.9th power; multiply by 0.15
rules.embAc: multiply link- or button-contained links, buttons, inputs, and selects by 4
rules.focOp: multiply nonfocusable operable elements by 4, nonoperable focusable by 1; sum
rules.hover: multiply elements adding visible content when hovered by 4, elements made visible by 2, elements with opacity changes by 0.3; sum
rules.ibm: multiply violations by 4, recommendatons by 2; sum; subtract discounts
rules.labClash: multiply conflictually labeled elements by 2, unlabeled elements by 2; sum
rules.log: multiply log messages by logWeights.count, sum of characters in log messages by logWeights.size
rules.motion: get PNG screenshot sizes (sss); get differing-pixel counts between adjacent PNG screenshots (pd); â€œsssdâ€ = sss difference Ã· smaller sss; multiply mean adjacent sssd, maximum adjacent sssd, maximum over-all ssd by 15; divide mean pd, maximum pd by 25,000; multiply count of non-0 pd by 10; sum
rules.radioSet: multiply radio buttons not in fieldsets with legends and no other-name radio buttons by 2
rules.role: multiple role attributes with invalid or native-HTML-equivalent values by 2
rules.styleDiff: for each of element classes block a, inline a, button, h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, and h6, get diffStyles-distinct styles; multiply their count minus 1 by 2; multiply count of elements with non-plurality styles by 0.2; sum
rules.wave: multiply alerts by 2, contrast errors by 3, errors by 4; sum; subtract discounts
